trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_00<tab>Tierney believes you are ready to join a guildhest.

TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_01<tab>Guildhests are special operations organized by Adventurers' Guilds and overseen by battlewardens. To learn more about what guildhests entail, speak with Battlewarden Ribald.

TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_02<tab>Battlewarden Ribald explains that guildhests will test your ability to work with others to achieve a common goal. Unless you are content to conduct your adventures forever alone, it may be in your best interests to participate in these operations at least once.
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_TIERNEY_000_01<tab>Should you be interested in a challenge quite unlike your average levequest, you might consider joining a guildhest.

TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_TIERNEY_000_02<tab>If you wish to know more, pray speak with Battlewarden Ribald outside yonder tent. I will inform him of your success against the anoles so that there are no doubts as to your abilities.
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_01<tab>I was told a stalwart adventurer would be along shortly. I take it that is you? Then permit me to tell you all about our current operations.

TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_02<tab>Wait... Might this be your first time participating in a guildhest? I remember my first hest. It was the night of my twentieth nameday. My fellow guildmates invited me to join them in the slaying of a family of peistes who were stealing chocobo eggs from Bentbranch Meadows.

TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_03<tab>The moment we arrived, one of the terrible beasts immediately turned to me and charged. The thing was thrice my size and had already maimed several chocobokeeps.

TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_04<tab>There was no way I could win, so I simply froze and waited for the end. But that's when I remembered that I was not alone. My friends rallied around me, and together we defeated the peistes! That, my friend, is what a guildhest is truly about.
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_05<tab>What say you, friend? Care to experience a hest for yourself?
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>You have unlocked the Duty Finder! This feature allows you to undertake multiplayer duties without having to form a party on your own.

TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>To bring up the Duty Finder interface, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Finder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
